---
pagetitle: "Hypothesis Testing - Means Left Tail Test Question"
params:
  xbar: 98
  n: 15 
  mu: 110 
  s: 20 
---

```{r}
mu<-params$mu
xbar<-params$xbar
n<-params$n 
s<-params$s
```

Suppose that we wish to test if a population mean is less than $`r mu`$. We take a sample of size $n=`r n`$ and get $\bar x=`r xbar`$. Suppose that the sample standard deviation is $s=`r s`$.
